name: Beat Drifter (Constantine Pallas)
description:
---HOW TO PLAY---

Copy the file address of a song (.mp3 or .wav) and open the game. On windows, you can do this by holding shift and right clicking the file, then selecting 'Copy as Path'.

Some songs work better than others.

[Created in 36 hours for the Ontario Tech GPC Mechanics Jam]

Themes: Racing, Void, Projectile
